etymologies: Middle English: from Old French buloce ‘sloe’: of unknown origin

definitions: a thorny shrub or small tree of the rose family that bears purple-black fruits. It is a wild plum, of which the damson is the cultivated form.

notes.text: Prunus insititia (or Prunus domesticus subsp. insititia), family Rosaceae

shortDefinitions: thorny shrub or small tree with small purple-black plum-like fruits
